![](featured.jpg)

## Introduction

Network Diagrams are important in data visualization to bring out
relationships between diverse entities. They are used in ecology,
biology, transportation, and even history!

And hey, whom did Jon Snow marry?

## References

1.  Michael Gastner, [Data Analysis and Visualisation with R, Chapter
    23:
    Networks](https://michaelgastner.com/DAVisR2021/chap-networks.html)

2.  David Schoch, [Network Visualizations in R using ggraph and
    graphlayouts](http://mr.schochastics.net/netVizR.html)

3.  Konrad M. Lawson, [Toilers and Gangsters:Simple Network
    Visualization with R for
    Historians](https://kmlawson.github.io/dh-tutorials/network.html)
